title: How to Change the Devices Sharing Your Location on an iPhone

steps.title: Open the Find My app.
steps.content: Open the Find My app. This app's icon has a green circle with a blue dot at its center and blue beam at the top. You'll find it on your Home screen, by searching or by opening the Utilities folder in your app library. [1] X Research source If you don't see this app, you may need to re-download it from the App Store.

steps.title: Tap the Me tab.
steps.content: Tap the Me tab. It's at the bottom-right corner. A menu will expand.

steps.title: Tap Use this iPhone as My Location.
steps.content: Tap Use this iPhone as My Location . Once you select your iPhone, it will replace the other Apple device as the one that's sharing your location. Anyone with access to your location will now see the location of your iPhone instead of the other device.
